trans-unit.source: Writes a block of bytes to the file stream.
trans-unit.target: Skriver en blokk med byte til filstrøm.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyrer <xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Stream.Write%2A>

trans-unit.source: The `offset` parameter gives the offset of the byte in `array` (the buffer index) at which to begin copying, and the `count` parameter gives the number of bytes that will be written to the stream.
trans-unit.target: Den `offset` parameteren angir forskyvningen for byte i `array` (bufferen index) vil begynne å kopiere, og `count` parameteren angir antall byte som skrives til dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: If the write operation is successful, the current position of the stream is advanced by the number of bytes written.
trans-unit.target: Hvis Skriveoperasjonen lykkes, Avansert gjeldende posisjon for dataflyten på antall byte skrevet.

trans-unit.source: If an exception occurs, the current position of the stream is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår et unntak, endres ikke gjeldende posisjon for dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Use the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports writing.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Bruk av <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite%2A>til å fastslå om den gjeldende forekomsten, støtter skriving.</xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: For additional information, see <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Stream.CanWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: Do not interrupt a thread that is performing a write operation.
trans-unit.target: Ikke Avbryt en tråd som utfører en skriveoperasjon.

trans-unit.source: Although the application may appear to run successfully after the thread is unblocked, the interruption can decrease your application's performance and reliability.
trans-unit.target: Selv om programmet kan vises til kjøres når tråden er blokkert, kan avbruddet redusere programmets ytelse og pålitelighet.

trans-unit.source: For a list of common file and directory operations, see [Common I/O Tasks](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: En liste over vanlig og directory operasjoner, kan du se [vanlige oppgaver i i/u](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The buffer containing data to write to the stream.
trans-unit.target: Bufferen som inneholder data å skrive til dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based byte offset in `array` from which to begin copying bytes to the stream.
trans-unit.target: Forskyvning nullbasert byte i `array` som du vil kopiere byte til dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: The maximum number of bytes to write.
trans-unit.target: Maksimalt antall byte som skal skrive.

trans-unit.source: array is .
trans-unit.target: arrayis .

trans-unit.source: offset and count describe an invalid range in array.
trans-unit.target: offsetog count beskriver en ugyldig område i array.

trans-unit.source: offset or count is negative.
trans-unit.target: offseteller count er negativt.

trans-unit.source: The stream is closed.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten er lukket.

trans-unit.source: The current stream instance does not support writing.
trans-unit.target: Den gjeldende forekomsten Dataflyten støtter ikke skriving.

trans-unit.source: Asynchronously writes a sequence of bytes to the current stream, advances the current position within this stream by the number of bytes written, and monitors cancellation requests.
trans-unit.target: Asynkront skriver en sekvens med byte til gjeldende strøm flytter gjeldende plassering i denne dataflyten på antall byte skrevet og overvåker avbryte forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: The WriteAsync method enables you to perform resource-intensive file operations without blocking the main thread.
trans-unit.target: Metoden WriteAsync lar deg utføre ressursen mye filoperasjoner uten blokkerer hovedtråden.

trans-unit.source: This performance consideration is particularly important in a [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/add/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app or [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/add/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] app where a time-consuming stream operation can block the UI thread and make your app appear as if it is not working.
trans-unit.target: Denne ytelse vurderingen er spesielt viktig i en [!INCLUDE[win8_appname_long](~/add/includes/win8-appname-long-md.md)] app eller [!INCLUDE[desktop_appname](~/add/includes/desktop-appname-md.md)] appen der en tidkrevende dataflyten operasjon kan blokker UI-tråden og appen vises som om det ikke fungerer.

trans-unit.source: The async methods are used in conjunction with the `async` and `await` keywords in Visual Basic and C#.
trans-unit.target: Metodene asynkron brukes sammen med den `async` og `await` nøkkelord i Visual Basic og C#.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports reading.
trans-unit.target: Bruk av <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite%2A>til å fastslå om den gjeldende forekomsten, støtter lesing.</xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the operation is canceled before it completes, the returned task contains the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus> value for the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis operasjonen er avbrutt før den er fullført, returnerte oppgaven inneholder den <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus>verdien den <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Status%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Tasks.TaskStatus>

trans-unit.source: If the handle to the file is disposed, the returned task contains the <xref:System.ObjectDisposedException> exception in the <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis håndtaket for filen er fjernet, returnerte oppgaven inneholder den <xref:System.ObjectDisposedException>unntak i den <xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Threading.Tasks.Task.Exception%2A> </xref:System.ObjectDisposedException>

trans-unit.source: The buffer to write data from.
trans-unit.target: Buffer til å skrive data fra.

trans-unit.target: Tokenet, for å overvåke for å avbryte forespørsler.

trans-unit.source: Writes a byte to the current position in the file stream.
trans-unit.target: Skriver en byte til gjeldende plassering i filstrøm.

trans-unit.source: This method overrides <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteByte%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden overstyrer <xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteByte%2A>.</xref:System.IO.Stream.WriteByte%2A>

trans-unit.source: Use `WriteByte` to write a byte to a `FileStream` efficiently.
trans-unit.target: Bruk `WriteByte` å skrive en byte til en `FileStream` effektivt.

trans-unit.source: If the stream is closed or not writable, an exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis dataflyten er lukket eller ikke skrivbar, vil bli utløst et unntak.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Use the <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite%2A> property to determine whether the current instance supports writing.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Bruk av <xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite%2A>til å fastslå om den gjeldende forekomsten, støtter skriving.</xref:System.IO.FileStream.CanWrite%2A>
